## lane8 variable

Extracts 8-bit lane from given 32bit uint and returns as unsigned byte \[0x00 .. 0xff\].

- Lane \#0: bits 24-31 - Lane \#1: bits 16-23 - Lane \#2: bits 8-15 - Lane \#3: bits 0-7

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lane8: (x: number, lane: Lane8) => number
```
